articles.content: One week from Thursday, Fernando Tatis Jr. will return to the San Diego Padres upon the completion of his 80-game performance-enhancing drug suspension. Tatis has not played in an MLB game since the … [+1607 chars]

articles.title: Braves place SS Arcia on injured list with wrist fracture - ESPN
articles.description: The Atlanta Braves are placing shortstop Orlando Arcia on the injured list after he suffered a microfracture in his left wrist, the team announced Thursday.
articles.content:
The Atlanta Braves are placing shortstop Orlando Arcia on the injured list after he suffered a microfracture in his left wrist, the team announced Thursday.
